channel.title: Group on Etherington Research Group
channel.description: Recent content in Group on Etherington Research Group

item.title: Ruth gives talk at international conference in Japan
item.description: Ruth presents her latest research at ICEL 2024 in Kyoto, Japan.

item.title: Ruth has her first publication
item.description: Proud moment as Ruth publishes her first work in the Journal of Physical Chemistry B!

item.title: New Collaborative Work Published
item.description: A collaborative work with Dr Rebecca Salthouse and Dr Gareth Williams is now published

item.title: Marc gives a seminar at Newcastle University
item.description: Marc presents the group’s latest work on charge transfer and thermally activated delayed fluorescence at Newcastle University

item.title: Flint the Fluorofrog!
item.description: Our resident artist Will Tetlow has given our Fluorolog-QM a re-branding.

item.title: Everyone passes Annual Progression!
item.description: To celebrate everyone passing this year’s annual progression I gifted them their very own Hatch-branded Keep Cup

item.title: Ruth wins Poster Prize at the RSC PPG Early Career Meeting
item.description: Ruth wins a poster prize at the Royal Society of Chemistry Photophysics and Photochemistry Group Early Career Meeting in Sheffield

item.title: Rebecca Salthouse visits the group
item.description: Dr Rebecca Salthouse from UPC in Barcelona visits the group to give a seminar and discuss a new collaboration

item.title: ErrantScience Workshop
item.description: The group hosts ErrantScience to provide a workshop for communicating science through cartoons

item.title: Ruth is successful with an RSC Researcher Collaborations Grant
item.description: Ruth has been awarded some money from the Royal Society of Chemistry to visit the group of Dr Zac Hudson at the University of British Columbia

item.title: Will joins the group!
item.description: Will joins the group and presents his research from his visit to Uppsala University at the NUPV Group Meeting

item.title: ICSM 2024
item.description: Ruth and Marc represent the group at ICSM 2024

item.title: Group visit to Durham University Chemistry PGR Conference
item.description: The group visits the Durham University Chemistry Department Postgraduate Research Conference to see some of their latest research.

item.title: Hannah Hamilton visits from the Royal Society of Chemistry
item.description: The group hosts Hannah Hamilton from the Royal Society of Chemistry (RSC) as she gives a presentation about the RSC’s energy and green portfolio of journals.

item.title: Group visit to Deep North
item.description: Today we had our group meeting at Deep North making sure the team has the right fuel for their science

item.title: Ruth hosts a Pint of Science event in Newcastle!
item.description: Ruth demonstrates our group’s commitment to outreach by getting involved in Pint of Science and hosting one of the local events.

item.title: RSC Sustainable Laboratories Grant Success!
item.description: The group has been awarded a Royal Society of Chemistry Sustainable Laboratories Grant to explore greener solvents for spectroscopy.

item.title: Latest publication in Nature Materials
item.description: Out latest research on the improvement of Blue OLEDs is published in Nature Materials

item.title: Ruth gives her first full talk at an international conference
item.description: Ruth presents her recent work at the TIDE conference in Cologne.

item.title: TCSPC Capabiity for Fluorolog-QM
item.description: Time-correlated single photon counting (TCSPC) capability is now available on our Fluorolog-QM

item.title: Eli visits Newcastle
item.description: Prof. Eli Zysman-Colman gives a seminar at Newcastle University and visits our group at Northumbria University.

item.title: Bring on 2024!
item.description: A new year brings new science!

item.title: Ruth gives a talk at CDT Week!
item.description: Ruth presents her latest results on methylation of nitrogen atoms and the impact on photophysics at CDT Week 2023.

item.title: Dr Silvia Motti visits!
item.description: Dr Silvia Motti from the University of Southampton visits the group to give a research talk

item.title: Prof. Andy Monkman from Durham University gives a talk during Enrichment Week
item.description: Prof. Andy Monkman gives a talk to our 2nd year Physics students on From molecules that glow to TVs that you can roll up and put in your pocket

item.title: Dr Giorgia Marucci from HORIBA gives a talk during Enrichment Week
item.description: Dr Giorgia Marucci from HORIBA gives a talk to our 2nd year Physics students on Spectroscopy, industry and curiosity - the unexpected paths of light.

item.title: HORIBA - Science in Action Blog
item.description: Marc is featured in the latest Science in Action blog by HORIBA

item.title: Aidan joins the group!
item.description: Aidan joins the Knowles-Etherington Group, our joint team bridging the interface of synthetic and physical chemistry.

item.title: Aidan joins the group!
item.description: Aidan joins the Knowles-Etherington Group, our joint team bridging the interface of synthetic and physical chemistry.

item.title: Ruth gives her first talk at Optical Probes 2023
item.description: Ruth presents some of her latest work as both a flash talk and poster at Optical Probes 2023 in Como, Italy.

item.title: Marc gives a flash talk and poster presentation at Optical Probes 2023
item.description: Marc presents some of the group’s latest work at the Optical Probes 2023 in Como, Italy.

item.title: Marc talks at RSC Photophysics and Photochemistry Group Early Career Meeting 2023
item.description: Marc presents some of the group’s latest work at the RSC Photophysics and Photochemistry Group Early Career Meeting 2023 at the University of Strathclyde

item.title: Ruth presents a poster at the RSC Photophysics and Photochemistry Group Early Career Meeting 2023
item.description: Ruth presents some of her latest research at the RSC Photophysics and Photochemistry Group Early Career Meeting 2023 at the University of Strathclyde

item.title: Fluorolog-QM's 2nd Birthday
item.description: We celebrate the 2nd Birthday of one of our crucial pieces of equipment.

item.title: Chris leaves the Group
item.description: Chris leaves the group for new pastures.

item.title: Article Published!
item.description: The first article in collaboration with Ewan Matheson and the NUPV group is published.

item.title: Take a Break
item.description: It’s always nice to have a coffee break with the team

item.title: Marc and Chris visit York
item.description: Marc and Chris have a trip to York to chat science with the McGonigal Group

item.title: Fabio Cucinotta visits the Group
item.description: Fabio Cucinotta from Newcastle University gives a seminar and visits the group to chat science.

item.title: Mark Thompson visits the Group
item.description: Mark Thompson from the University of Southern California visits Newcastle and the Group

item.title: Ruth presents at the 2023 PGR Conference
item.description: Ruth presents her research on the carbazole-pyridinium salts at the 2023 PGR Conference

item.title: Chris Hogg presents at Group Meeting
item.description: Chris presents his PhD work at our weekly Group Meeting

item.title: Chris Hogg Joins the Group
item.description: Chris Hogg joins the group as a Research Assistant
